Is Hashgraph the Future of Decentralized Technology? [Video]

Nov 23, 2017
1 minute read

In a panel moderated by Demetri Kofinas, host of the Hidden Forces podcast, the conversation at The Assemblage NoMad looked at how Hashgraph – an entirely new distributed ledger technology – may change the world and displace an entire industry with it.

"The Future is not Blockchain. It's Hashgraph."

Could Hashgraph be the future of decentralized technology? Share your opinion with us.
